channel.title: Editing [508] characters
channel.description:
i know i reposted this, but...
do you edit the login.class or the login.java? and please tell me what to do in there, i just started using [508].
I want to know how to like add items to the account, change levels, and make it an admin.
thx, llama

just leave it as english, skill the same. Ill edit it into what i want, then can u edit it backl?

item.title: Editing [508] characters
item.dc:creator: @llamalord318 llamalord318
item.description:
@llamalord318 wrote:

i kinda figured the items would be in the data>bin>characters>mainsave, but when i open up my account, its written in chinese or japanese, here is what it says:獵牥慮敭氺慬慭潬摲ㄳ8慰獳潷摲ㄺ㜶㜵ㄸ㐲猀慴瑲摥ㄺ爀杩瑨㩳0扡硳㌺ㄲ2扡祳㌺㈴4畲敮敮杲㩹〱0瑡慴正瑳汹㩥0畡潴敲慴楬瑡㩥0灳捥慩慬潭湵㩴〱0歳汵瑬浩牥〺最湥敤㩲0汓祡牥慔歳〺匀慬敹䅲㩭0潒浯㨰1潒浯㨱0潒浯㨲0潒浯㨳0潒浯㨴1潒浯吰灹㩥6潒浯吱灹㩥0潒浯吲灹㩥0潒浯吳灹㩥0潒浯吴灹㩥7慇摲湥〺䜀牡敤ㅮ〺䜀牡敤㉮〺䜀牡敤㍮〺䜀牡敤㑮ㄺ䐀慲潧卮慬敹㩲0畑獥側楯瑮㩳0灕慤整㈺䰀慯敤䉤捡畫㩰0慆業楬牡祔数〺䌀慬乮浡㩥0潈獵䑥捥牯ㄺ㠵5潬歯㨰0潬歯㨱〱氀潯㉫ㄺ8潬歯㨳㘲氀潯㑫㌺3潬歯㨵㘳氀潯㙫㐺2歳汩ぬㄺ〬猀楫汬㨱ⰱ0歳汩㉬ㄺ〬猀楫汬㨳〱ㄬ㔱4歳汩㑬ㄺ〬猀楫汬㨵ⰱ0歳汩㙬ㄺ〬猀楫汬㨷ⰱ0歳汩㡬ㄺ〬猀楫汬㨹ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨰ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨱ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨲ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨳ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨴ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨵ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨶ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨷ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨸ⰱ0歳汩ㅬ㨹ⰱ0歳汩㉬㨰ⰱ0歳汩㉬㨱ⰱ0歳汩㉬㨲ⰱ0歳汩㉬㨳ⰱ0歳汩㉬㨴ⰱ0瑩浥㨰〹㌰ㄬ椀整ㅭ㤺㔹㈬〰〰椀整㉭㌺ㄹㄬ椀整㍭㌺ㄹㄬ椀整㑭㌺ㄹㄬ椀整㕭㌺ㄹㄬ椀整㙭㌺ㄹㄬ渀汵l

Some of the other account(from the base) are written in english…

WTF do i do?!?

Read full topic

item.title: Editing [508] characters
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

making an account admin is simple

Player rights

0 = Normal Player
1 = Player Moderater
2 = Administrator

[hr]
Step one

Open up login.java

search for

p.rights = 2; }

you should see something like this

if (p.username.equals("Playername")) { p.rights = 2; }

Step Two
Change Playername to the users account name and change the 2 to 1 for mod (see player rights table)

[hr]

To edit an accounts stats and items you go to this directory

Bin>Data>Characters>Mainsave>(accountname)

Change what you would like in the account file and then save
Please note
The user must be offline when you do this

Read full topic
